summary: This Mod features the improvement of NPC of the way they look in Skyim.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg694/scaled.php?server=694&filename=steamlogon.jpg&res=landing[/img]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg694/scaled.php?server=694&filename=word1j.png&res=landing[/img]

Welcome to RedStudio’s NPC OVERHAUL, I make this Mod to improve the NPC the way they look in Skyrim. 

The Mod itself does not include Hair pack, so please download it first before installing this mod. (Check below for more information in “Requirement”)

If any of the NPC appears naked just disable them using console command and re-enable them again

Any bugs or conflict related please kindly report to me in your comment, so it can be resolve quickly thanks.

If you like this mod please don\'t forget to Endorse it thanks.

[b][color=#a9a9a9][size=2]================================================================================================================================[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg560/scaled.php?server=560&filename=word2.png&res=landing[/img]

Extract the content of the archive and install it to your Skyrim/Data, after that enable it from your Skyrim.exe

If you are using NMM (Nexus Mod Manager) it will be an easy installation but if you get the promp from installing the male and female NPC overhaul loose file and ask you whether you want to overwrite it click no to all

Uninstall
Loose File only
Delete the Textue and Meshes facegenData along with the esp 
Location of the texture and meshes facegenData file
(Skyrim/data/texture/actors/character/facegendata/facetint/skyrim.esm)  (Skyrim/data/meshes/actors/character/facegendata/facetint/skyrim.esm)

[b][color=#a9a9a9][size=2]================================================================================================================================[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg805/scaled.php?server=805&filename=word3.png&res=landing[/img]

The Texture Pack Different
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg405/scaled.php?server=405&filename=texturepack.jpg&res=landing[/img]
The Texture Pack contains face mesh and texture for female only. So if you want exact look same as the screen shot shown please download it.

To use your own face mesh and texture just install this texture pack as the first order and replace it with other face mesh and texture that you own as last order.

Make sure to download this mod first before you install this mod or it will crash upon loading

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Link[/url]
here are list to download
1. Apachii Main file
2. update fix for 1.4 male Khajiit
3. Apachii Skyhair Female version 1.0 this included 10 more female hair

Dawnguard DLC is require if you download the DLC NPC pack

Optional Texture
Here are some mod I use for my male texture so go try it out your own.
1. Better Male –beautiful nudes and faces – new hairstyle by Chris57 and Flavoredsoul: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Link[/url]
2. HQ Beards – Vanilla Texture replacers by Regn: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21620]Link[/url]

[b][color=#a9a9a9][size=2]================================================================================================================================[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg221/scaled.php?server=221&filename=word5.png&res=landing[/img]

Female
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg837/scaled.php?server=837&filename=npcfemaleoverhaulphoto.jpg&res=landing[/img]
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg850/scaled.php?server=850&filename=npcfemaleoverhaulphoto2.jpg&res=landing[/img]

Male
[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg337/scaled.php?server=337&filename=npcmaleoverhaulphoto.jpg&res=landing[/img]

[b][color=#a9a9a9][size=2]================================================================================================================================[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg201/scaled.php?server=201&filename=word6.png&res=landing[/img]

This mod has no current conflict with any mod I known of except if you using other NPC overhaul that changes the look.

If any of the NPC appears naked just disable them using console command and re-enable them again

[b][color=#a9a9a9][size=2]================================================================================================================================[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg708/scaled.php?server=708&filename=word9.png&res=landing[/img]

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: My NPC appear with a different hair or appear bald, is something wrong? [/size][/color][/b]
A: Don\'t worry there noting wrong, it a possible cause by not installing Apachii Skyhair look at the \"requirement\" for detail

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: I have other NPC mod install, can it go together?[/size][/color][/b]
A: Sadly to tell you, No it cannot go together and will cause a conflict with it because of the modify changes done to the NPC actor appearance but if you using other mod that add new character in it, will not conflict with it like example: Girls of skyrim.

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: I find your mod have two esp and bsa can they be install together?[/size][/color][/b]
A: Yes it can be install together

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: I have a mod call UFO (Ultimate Follower Overhaul) install, will it conflict with it?[/size][/color][/b]
A: No it will not conflict but if you install my NPC overhaul as first order and install UFO as 2nd order it will conflict with it, So make sure you install this as 2nd order if you using any follower mod.

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: I load your Mod and it crash upon loading. how to solves this problem[/size][/color][/b]
A: switch off all your mod first and load the game without any mod on except skyrim.esm and update.esm after that save a new slot this will create a clean save now load back all your mod as per normal. If it still crash check any mod is conflicting with my NPC overhaul and kindly report me in your comment.

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: Your NPC look nice and pretty can I request from you to help me make other NPC[/size][/color][/b]
A: Not a problem I willing to accept any request, so if you want just write it down in the comments or send me a message.

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: can I still edit the NPC that are from the list?[/size][/color][/b]
A: Yes you can Edit to your own liking.

[b][color=#00bfff][size=2]Q: Hey your mod does not look good and you suck[/size][/color][/b]
A: all I can say is you better go f**k yourself, don\'t let me Kungfu you back where you are, if you think you create a better look than create your own f**king Troll 

[b][color=#a9a9a9][size=2]================================================================================================================================[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg94/scaled.php?server=94&filename=word4u.png&res=landing[/img]

September 4 2012
A new version of file install for download
Remove NPC Athis, Carlotta
Added a few more DLC npc

Aug 22 2012 Version 1.6
Added some Npc and edited a few more
Edited npc Jordis, Carlotta, Constance, Svana and Vex
Added npc Elisf and Evettee
New Texture pack added
Optional Download added 6 forsworn female
Female animation for HouseCarl Jordis and lydia

Aug 18 2012 Version 1.0 DLC
Npc for DLC \"DawnGuard\"
Npc added Serana

Aug 18 2012 Version 1.5
Added more Npc then before and edited a few
Female Npc added Alva, Constance, Eola, Grelka, Hroki, Ingun, Iona, Jordis, Margret, Mjoll, Vex, Svana, Hroki
Male Npc added Bennor, Ogol, Argis, Kharjo, Marcurio
Npc been re-edited Muiri and Njada

Aug 16 2012 Version 1.2
Added Npc Carlotta Valentia, Hulda
Remake Narri, Karita and abenlone
Added new texture pack to download
Correct and fix name from \"texture\" to \"textures\"

Aug 16 2012
Added Npc for male
Listed npc that been edited Athis, Faendal, Sven, Vilkas and Farlkas

Aug 14 2012
Just prepare a Fixed file for Pipup Poses by Halofarm: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17174]Link[/url]
Ysolda will no longer look with face texture error

Aug 13 2012 Version 1.1
Added NPC Ysolda, Uthgerd, Lydia and Olfina.
Remake Camilla, Aela, Ria, Delphine, Njada, Saadia and Delphine

[b][color=#a9a9a9][size=2]================================================================================================================================[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg404/scaled.php?server=404&filename=word7.png&res=landing[/img]

Marriages Mod - To Have & To Hold by JoeThinkStudios which you can Download from Steam workshop: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11579]Link[/url]

DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]Link[/url]

CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4888]Link[/url]

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Link[/url]

Better Females by Bella by BellaGail: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Link[/url]

High Quality Eyes by Xenius: [url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/498]Link[/url]

The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]Link[/url]

[b][color=#a9a9a9][size=2]================================================================================================================================[/size][/color][/b]

[img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg534/scaled.php?server=534&filename=word8.png&res=landing[/img]

Thank to all People who made many kind of Mod to make a Better SKYRIM gameplay and those who endorse this mod. I thank you...
author: REDMOON
